flounder.devices

Class FlounderDevices

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.devices.FlounderDevices
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModule

    public class FlounderDevices
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModule
    Manages the all GLFW devices in a separate thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlounderDevices(int width, int height, java.lang.String title, boolean vsync, boolean antialiasing, int samples, boolean fullscreen)
      Creates all of the GLFW devices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlounderDevices

        public FlounderDevices(int width,
                       int height,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       boolean vsync,
                       boolean antialiasing,
                       int samples,
                       boolean fullscreen)
        Creates all of the GLFW devices.
        Parameters:
        width - The window width in pixels.
        height - The window height in pixels.
        title - The window title.
        vsync - If the window will use vSync..
        antialiasing - If OpenGL will use antialiasing.
        samples - How many MFAA samples should be done before swapping buffers. Zero disables multisampling. GLFW_DONT_CARE means no preference.
        fullscreen - If the window will start fullscreen.
